name: employees
description: Information about employees including their names and roles.

columns.name: dept_id
columns.description: ID of the department the employee belongs to. Links to departments.id.

columns.name: role
columns.description: Job title or role of the employee.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the department (e.g., Engineering, Sales).

columns.name: manager_id
columns.description: Employee ID of the department manager. Links to employees.id.

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: ID of the employee. Links to employees.id.

name: projects
description: Projects being worked on by departments.

columns.name: dept_id
columns.description: ID of the department managing the project. Links to departments.id.

columns.name: budget
columns.description: Total budget allocated to the project.

name: Salary Currency
description: All salaries are currently stored in USD. If asked for other currencies, note that the data is in USD.

name: Manager Identification
description: To find a department's manager, join departments.manager_id with employees.id.
